department: Department of Humanities and Social Sciences
name: HUL332 Fantasy Literature
description: Major Themes of Fantasy: Archetypes and Myths; Motifs - journeys, theology, devices and aides; creation of alternate worlds; treatment of time and space; close readings of individual texts.
